name: `seek` implemented for `VideoPlayer`.
body:
Seeking added to VideoPlayer.
On WSL, video from devices disabled to prevent cv2 errors from polluting terminal.

name: Stderr output is no longer lost when app exits.
body:
Output to stderr redirected to a buffer while app is running. This buffer is printed to stderr when app exits.

`App` can now always be exited with `ctrl+c` and `exit_key` is no longer an argument or attribute of `App`.
This changes previous default behavior of exiting with `escape`.

name: `on_key_press`, `key_press_event`, and `KeyPressEvent` names changed.
body:
`on_key_press`, `key_press_event`, and `KeyPressEvent` names changed to `on_key`, `key_event`, and `KeyEvent` respectively.

GraphicWidget rendering reverted to not create unnecessary copies of textures.

All enums are now string enums.

name: Introduction of `on_add` and `on_remove`.
body:
`on_add`, `on_remove`, `prolicide`, and `destroy` methods added to `Widget`. `on_add` and `on_remove` are called when a widget is added or removed from the widget tree. Scheduling tasks for widgets can now be deferred until `on_add` which allows `run_widget_as_app` to accept
widget instances.  Change to `run_widget_as_app` is breaking.

Particle fields refactored and vectorized. Breaks previous particle field API.

`on_keypress` renamed `on_key_press` to match event name. Dispatch methods renamed to match event names. This change is breaking.

`Animation` and `Video` `play` methods return the created task so they may be awaited.

name: Add additional constructors to Image , Parallax and Animation.
body:
Add additional constructors to Image , Parallax and Animation.
path is now an optional keyword argument. These widgets can instead be constructed from sprites or textures (or images).

name: `Parallax` widget API now mirrors `Animation` API.
body: `Parallax` widget API now mirrors `Animation` API.  Instead of providing a list of `GraphicWidget`s for layers, `Parallax` now accepts a path to a directory with images to use as layers for the parallax.

name: New kwargs for `VideoPlayer` and `Animation`.
body:
Added `loop` kwarg to `VideoPlayer`.
Added `reverse` kwarg to `Animation`.

name: IO handling refactored. Graphic rendering improved.
body:
Double- and triple-click information is now packaged in `MouseEvent`.  `on_double_click` and `on_triple_click` methods removed as all mouse events can now be handled with `on_click`.

Renamed `on_` methods to match the events they handle. `on_click` renamed to `on_mouse`. `on_press` renamed `on_keypress`.

`GraphicWidget.render` method previously rendered even and odd rows separately. This is now done all at once with some fancy reshaping of color arrays.

name: `GridLayout` api changes.
body:
Previous private method `_index_at` of `GridLayout` is now public.

`GridLayout` now repositions children on resize.

name: Bug Fix: Force entire screen redraw with flag on terminal resize.
body:
Bug Fix: Force entire screen redraw with flag on terminal resize.

Previous method could fail depending on effects of `render_children`.

name: Resizing updated. Widget properties now subscribable.
body: Bump to fix README on PYPI.

name: Resizing updated. Widget properties now subscribable.
body:
`resize` method replaced with `size` property and `on_size` method.
Widget properties decorated with `emitter` can now be subscribed to by other widgets.
Added progress bars.
Added split layouts.

name: Removed pywin32 dependency. Apps can be recorded in asciicast format.
body:
Removed pywin32 dependency. 
Apps can be recorded in asciicast format.

name: Updated vt100 parsing.
body: Refactored VT100 ansi escape parsing.

name: Menu widget added.
body: Menu widget added. Menu and sub-menus  can be navigated with arrow keys.  Toggle items are also available for menus.

name: Collision bug fix.
body: And improvements to `FocusBehavior`, `Window`, `FileChooser`.

name: Breaking API changes and `GridLayout` added.
body:
`WidgetBase` is no longer abstract and has been renamed to `Widget`.

Some `App` init arguments have been changed to match `Widget`.

`GridLayout` added. A widget that automatically places its children into a grid.

Indicators added to ColorPicker.

Particle fields now dispatch double- and triple-clicks.

`Animation` refactored.

name: ShadowCaster added. Focus behavior added.
body:
`ShadowCaster` implements restrictive precise angle shadowcasting.

`FocusBehavior` allows widgets to take focus by pressing `tab` or by clicking on them.

name: Improved alpha compositing with non graphic widgets.
ToggleButton and ToggleButtonBehavior
body: `ToggleButtons` and `ToggleButtonBehavior` added.

name: Themable and Focus behaviors.
body:
Inheriting the `Themable` behavior allows a widget to share a common color theme with other themable widgets.

Tab select or click on a widgets with that inherit from `Focus` behavior to give them focus.

name: Double-click and triple-click dispatching added.
body:
# New Features
Widgets have new methods `on_double_click` and `on_triple_click` to handle double- and triple-clicks.
Double-click timeout can be modified with a kwarg to `App` class.

# API Changes
`_WidgetBase` is now public and renamed `WidgetBase`.
Render interval and terminal size polling interval can be modified with kwargs to `App` class.

name: `run_widget_as_app` convenience function added.
body:
`run_widget_as_app` convenience function added.

Bug fix for grab behavior: stop click dispatching when a grab method is called.

name: Min/max height/width added to `GrabResizeBehavior`.
body:
Min/max height/width added to `GrabResizeBehavior`.

New example added, `doom_fire.py`. An implementation of the fire effect from DOOM!

name: Feature: Transitions
body:
Transitions added. Smoothly update a widget's properties over time.

Breaking: Anchor enum values now lowercase.

name: LinePlot fixes and improved error messages.
ScrollView Bugfix.
body: Name errors fixed in ScrollView. LinePlot kwargs passed to children.

name: LinePlot widget added.
body: `LinePlot` widget added. `LinePlot` is an interactive line plot (zoomable and scrollable) that includes ticks, labels and a moveable legend.

name: v0.1.3
body: Plot2D widget added.

name: Test Release
body: This is a test release.
